name: XWUI Space Component
description: Space component for adding consistent spacing between elements. Supports horizontal and vertical directions, wrapping, and split separators. Useful for layout and spacing management.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

size.description: Size of spacing between items (string or number)

wrap.description: Whether items should wrap to next line

split.description: Whether to show split separators between items

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the space container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of items (strings or HTMLElements) to display with spacing
